welcome_message_body: Welcome to Galloway, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlantic City International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Atlantic City International Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Millville Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Millville Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
